header.description: I am a software engineer passionate about building dynamic and efficient web applications. With experience in full-stack development, I work with modern technologies to create seamless, high-performance digital solutions.

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a software developer with expertise in modern web technologies, cloud computing, and API integrations. I have built scalable and efficient applications for various industries, leveraging AWS, Next.js, and database management.

education.title: Education
education.description: B.S. Computer Science and Technology Engineering (Aug 2020 - Jun 2024)

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Web applications, e-commerce platforms, and custom systems for businesses, improving efficiency and user experience

services.subtitle: What I offer
services.title: My Services
services.description: Custom web solutions, from e-commerce to business automation, ensuring performance and scalability.

web.title: Custom Web Development
web.description: I build fast, responsive, and scalable web applications tailored to your business needs, ensuring high performance and seamless user experience.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Secure and efficient online stores with payment gateways, inventory management, and a great shopping experience.

business.title: Custom Business Systems
business.description: Creating internal platforms and automation tools to streamline business operations, from order management to inventory tracking.

api.title: API Development & Integration
api.description: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services to enhance your digital ecosystem.

work.subtitle: Portfolio
work.title: My Work
work.description: A showcase of web applications and business solutions I've built for clients.

fyradrive.description: A platform for buying and selling vehicles, featuring advanced search filters, admin dashboard, and statistics.

viaproposito.description: A platform to discover your personal profile and strengths through a quick, personalized self-assessment test with instant results.

portfolio.description: Designed and developed my portfolio to showcase my projects, experience, and services.

wtp.description: Built an online store with payment processing and secure authentication.

elpostre.description: Rebuilt a bakery's online store with Next.js, improving UX and boosting online orders by 25%.

cassad.description: Developed a professional website for legal and real estate services, enhancing online presence.

contagg.description: A platform to manage NFC devices for sharing personal, medical, or pet info securely—includes device activation, profile management, and scan analytics.

starts.description: Collaborative innovation platform that transforms employee ideas into business solutions using gamification, structured evaluation, and actionable analytics.

unlid.description: A platform for posting and requesting real estate properties, featuring user authentication, property management, and advanced search capabilities.

intro.title: Let's Start a Conversation
intro.description: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life with modern web solutions.
